contentencoded: First up, more on the latest GDP report, which showed a strong 4% growth in the 2nd quarter. Plus, a key ruling against McDonald's gives hope to those looking to force the company's franchisees to raise their wages to $15 an hour. Also, the latest lobbying force to hit Washington comes from an unexpected source: gamers.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday July 30, 2014
teaser: The latest GDP report, McDonald's wages, and video game lobbyists.
title: PODCAST: Video game lobby
description: The latest GDP report, McDonald's wages, and video game lobbyists.
